message: I'm excited to offer you this premium product! It's one of our top-of-the-line items, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100, which is a steal considering its exceptional quality. What do you say? Will you take it home today?
I'll take it home today, thanks!

Great choice on the previous product! Now, I'd like to offer you another exceptional item that's sure to impress. This one is also a top-quality product, and I'm confident you'll appreciate its features. I'm still offering it to you for $100, a fair price considering its value. Will you take another chance and buy this one too?
I'll take it home today, thanks!

I'll take it home today, thanks!

Okay, I'll take a chance. I'm willing to trust your judgment this time.
